mapper.sql: a.id, a.parent_id AS "parent.id", a.parent_ids, a.code, a.name, a.sort, a.type, a.remarks, a.insert_by AS "insertBy.id", a.insert_time, a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_time, a.is_deleted, p.name AS "parent.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_office p ON p.id = a.parent_id
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM sys_area a
WHERE a.is_deleted = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} ORDER BY a.code
SELECT a.id, a.parent_id AS "parent.id", a.parent_ids FROM sys_area a WHERE a.is_deleted = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND a.parent_ids LIKE #{parentIds} ORDER BY a.code
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_area( id, parent_id, parent_ids, code, name, sort, type, insert_by, insert_time, update_by, update_time, remarks, is_deleted ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{parent.id}, #{parentIds}, #{code}, #{name}, #{sort}, #{type}, #{insertBy.id}, #{insertTime}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateTime}, #{remarks}, #{isDeleted} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_area SET parent_id = #{parent.id}, parent_ids = #{parentIds}, code = #{code}, name = #{name}, sort = #{sort}, type = #{type}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_time = #{updateTime}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
